carousel.desc: [Apache Software turned to Symantec for cloud-based Code Signing and SSL certificate management solutions. The results: streamlined\, secure code signing access for 4\,000 developers across 6 continents\, minimized risk\, and on-demand SSL certificates in minutes instead of days.,For ebay\, the world’s largest online marketplace\, brand protection is a top priority. The company has implemented a large portfolio of Symantec security solutions for everything from data loss prevention\, to endpoint security\, to managed security\, to encryption technologies.,LocalTapiola wanted to ensure its 5\,000 SSL certificates never disrupted service quality by expiring unexpectedly. They deployed Symantec SSL Discovery to monitor certificates\, receive automatic alerts on renewals\, and manage third-party certificates.]
